name: BitTorrent Open Source License v1.1
body:
BitTorrent Open Source LicenseVersion 1.1

This BitTorrent Open Source License (the "License") applies to the BitTorrent client and

This License complies with the Open Source Definition and is derived from the Jabber Open Source License

This License provides that:

Alternatively, you may distribute your Derivative Works under any other OSI-approved Open Source license,

New versions of this License may be published from time to time in connection with new versions of a

This License relies on precise definitions for certain terms. Those terms are defined when they are first

License Terms

1. You may use or give away the Licensed Product, alone or as a component of an aggregate software

2. Both Source Code and executable versions of the Licensed Product, including Modifications made by

the License.)

3. You are allowed to make Modifications to the Licensed Product, and you can create Derivative
Works from it. (The term "Derivative Works" is defined in the License.)

4. By accepting the Licensed Product under the provisions of this License, you agree that any
Modifications you make to the Licensed Product and then distribute are governed by the

5. You may sell, accept donations or otherwise receive compensation for executable versions of a

Modifications. For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent your executable version of a Licensed

not sell, accept donations or otherwise receive compensation for such executable.

6. If you sublicense the Licensed Product or Derivative Works, you may charge fees for warranty or
support, or for accepting indemnity or liability obligations to your customers. You cannot

7. If you assert any patent claims against the Licensor relating to the Licensed Product, or if you
breach any terms of the License, your rights to the Licensed Product under this License

hereby grants you a world-wide, royalty-free, non-exclusive license, subject to third party

2. Grant of License to Modifications From Contributor. "Modifications" means any additions
to or deletions from the substance or structure of (i) a file containing a Licensed Product,
or (ii) any new file that contains any part of a Licensed Product. Hereinafter in this

you receive from any Contributor. Subject to the terms and conditions of this License, By

hereby grants you a world-wide, royalty-free, non-exclusive license, subject to third party

4. Your Obligations Regarding Distribution.

5. Inability to Comply Due to Statute or Regulation. If it is impossible for you to comply with any
of the terms of this License with respect to some or all of the Licensed Product due to

Such description must be included in the LEGAL file described in Section 4(d), and must be

or regulation, such description must be sufficiently detailed for a recipient of ordinary
skill at computer programming to be able to understand it.

6. Application of This License. This License applies to code to which Licensor or Contributor has

7. Versions of This License.

8. Disclaimer of Warranty. LICENSED PRODUCT IS PROVIDED UNDER THIS LICENSE ON AN AS IS BASIS,

10. Limitation of Liability. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES AND UNDER NO LEGAL THEORY, WHETHER TORT

EXTENT APPLICABLE LAW PROHIBITS SUCH LIMITATION. SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION

11. Responsibility for Claims. As between Licensor and Contributors, each party is responsible for

12. U.S. Government End Users. The Licensed Product is a commercial item, as that term is defined in

Consistent with 48 C.F.R. 12.212 and 48 C.F.R. 227.7202-1 through 227.7202-4 (June 1995), all
U.S. Government End Users acquire Licensed Product with only those rights set forth

13. Miscellaneous. This License represents the complete agreement concerning the subject matter

14. Definition of You in This License. You throughout this License, whether in upper or lower case,

(iii) beneficial ownership of such entity. You are responsible for advising any affiliated

15. Glossary. All defined terms in this License that are used in more than one Section of this

EXHIBIT A

The Notice below must appear in each file of the Source Code of any copy you distribute of the Licensed
